= EXISTS _key_ =
_Time complexity: O(1)_

 Test if the specified key exists. The command returns
 "0" if the key exists, otherwise "1" is returned.
 Note that even keys set with an empty string as value will
 return "1".

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Integer reply], specifically:

{{{
1 if the key exists.
0 if the key does not exist.
}}}

== See also ==
 * [SetnxCommand SETNX] is a `SET if not EXISTS` atomic operation.
 * [SismemberCommand SISMEMBER] test if an element is a member of a Set.
